statements: SELECT * FROM backup_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT backup_id, backup_file_path FROM backup_data ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM backup_data WHERE backup_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT backup_id, backup_date FROM backup_data WHERE backup_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT backup_file_path FROM backup_data WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY backup_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, backup_id, backup_date, backup_file_path FROM backup_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_data WHERE backup_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id ASC, backup_date DESC;
SELECT backup_id, backup_date FROM backup_data WHERE user_id = 2 AND backup_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM backup_data WHERE backup_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(backup_id) AS num_backups FROM backup_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_backups > 5 ORDER BY num_backups DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, backup_date FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_file IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT b.backup_id, u.username, b.backup_file FROM backups b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id ORDER BY b.backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_backup_data;
SELECT user_id, backup_id FROM user_backup_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT backup_id, backup_data FROM user_backup_data WHERE backup_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT user_id, backup_id, log_timestamp FROM backup_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, retention_period FROM backup_settings WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '30 days';
SELECT user_id, backup_id, backup_data FROM user_backup_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT backup_id, user_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM backup_logs WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT user_id, retention_period, storage_location FROM backup_settings WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, backup_id, backup_data FROM user_backup_data WHERE backup_id IS NOT NULL AND backup_id <> '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_id > 100;
SELECT event_type, event_date, event_description FROM disaster_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE id = 5;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, b.backup_location, r.restore_status FROM user_accounts u JOIN backups b ON u.id = b.user_id JOIN restore_history r ON b.backup_id = r.backup_id;
SELECT e.event_type, e.event_date, e.event_description, b.backup_location FROM disaster_events e LEFT JOIN backups b ON e.event_id = b.backup_id;
SELECT * FROM UserBackups ORDER BY backup_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, backup_path FROM UserBackups WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT setting_id, backup_frequency FROM BackupSettings WHERE notification_email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT log_description, log_time FROM BackupLogs ORDER BY log_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM BackupStatus WHERE is_successful = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserCredentials WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM BackupLogs ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT UserCredentials.username, BackupSettings.backup_frequency FROM UserCredentials JOIN BackupSettings ON UserCredentials.user_id = BackupSettings.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_backups FROM UserBackups GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_backups > 3;
